thread.title: Adam Lallana: Why I’m loving life under Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp
thread.title_full: Adam Lallana: Why I’m loving life under Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp

title: Adam Lallana: Why I’m loving life under Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp
text: Adam Lallana: Why I’m loving life under Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp Saturday, 24 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Adam Lallana says he is loving life under new Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp. The Reds midfielder has started both of Klopp’s games in charge of the Merseyside outfit after the 48-year-old German was named as Brendan Rodgers’s successor earlier this month. England international Lallana struggled to tie down a regular starting spot under the Northern […] The post Adam Lallana: Why I’m loving life under Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp appeared first on The Sport Review.
